author: Retro CreaTbJ

text:
@Retro CreaTbJ dafuq?!?!
How can he not love ciptunes and make them so good?
author: Nenner KN

text: @Nenner KN - Ironically, it's because he didn't like chiptunes that he made such good ones. He said that he didn't like how "fake" and "plain" they sounded, so he tried to make them sound expressive and such, and he delivered.
